DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Dr. Reddy 's Desloratadine Tablets , 5 mg Under Fasting Conditions .
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Single-Dose , Two-Way Crossover Relative Bioavailability Study Desloratadine 5 mg Tablet Fasted Normal , Healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Is individual healthy , normal adult man woman volunteer participate ? Is s/he within 18 45 year age , inclusive ? Is his/her BMI 19 30 , inclusive ? Is willing avoid pregnancy abstain sexual intercourse nonsterile male partner , use one follow method : diaphragm + spermicide condom + spermicide ( least 14 day dose ) , intrauterine contraceptive device hormonal contraceptive ( least 4 week prior dose ) , surgically sterile postmenopausal least six month prior enter study ? Is s/he consider reliable capable understand his/her responsibility role study ? Has s/he provide write informed consent ? A answer question indicate individual ineligible enrollment Does individual history allergy hypersensitivity desloratadine ? Does s/he clinically significant laboratory abnormality would interfere conduct interpretation study jeopardize his/her safety ? Does s/he significant history clinical evidence autoimmune , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , hematological , hematopoietic , hepatic , neurological , ongoing infection , pancreatic , renal disease would interfere conduct interpretation study jeopardize his/her safety ? Is nurse ? Does s/he serious psychological illness ? Does s/he significant history ( within past year ) clinical evidence alcohol drug abuse ? Does s/he positive urine drug screen positive HIV1 , hepatitis B C screen , positive pregnancy test ? Is s/he unable refrain use alcohol xanthinecontaining food beverage period begin 48 hour prior study drug administration end last blood sample take study period ? . Has s/he use prescription drug , hormonal contraceptive , 14day period prior study initiation , OTC drug 72hour period precede study initiation ? Is s/he unable refrain use concomitant medication , hormonal contraceptive , study ? Has s/he donate lose blood , participate clinical study involve withdrawal large volume blood ( 480 mL ) , six week period precede study initiation ? Has s/he donate plasma two week period precede study initiation ? Has s/he use tobacco product 3 month precede drug administration ? Has s/he receive investigational drug 30 day period precede study initiation ? A yes answer question indicate individual ineligible enrollment .
